pr_title: Adds some methods to re-use PageHelpers in processes to iterate over total items

timeline.message:
Adds some methods to re-use PageHelpers in processes to iterate over total items

While this is not really the purpose of these helpers, this prevents a lot of duplicate code when building processes that are linked to page views, for example export processes.

Fixes: SIRI-146

Enables aggregations with a processContext

Fixes: SIRI-146

timeline.body: couldn't we use a Function<String,Value> parameterProvider here?
timeline.bodyText: couldn't we use a Function<String,Value> parameterProvider here?
timeline.bodyHTML: couldn't we use a Function<String,Value> parameterProvider here?
timeline.author: andyHa
andyHa
andyHa
andyHa

timeline.message:
Uses a generic parameter provider instead of a process context

Fixes: SIRI-146

timeline.body:
```suggestion
     * While this is not the purpose of this helper, this can be used to easily re-use code that is intended for page views.
```

timeline.author: sabieber
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -349,6 +359,53 @@ public B withPageSize(int pageSize) { return result; } + /** + * Calls the given function on all items in the result ignoring {@link #pageSize}, as long as it returns true. + *

+ * While this is not the purpose of this helper, this can be used to easily re-use code that is inteded for page views. + * For example, together with {@link #withParameterProvider(Function)} this can be used to export the same page view in a process, + * using the same query and facet suppliers as the view that is to be exported. + * + * @param resultHandler the handle to be invoked for each item in the result
